AI-powered writing assistant for content: AI-powered writing assistant for content creation, code generation, translations, and more using multiple AI models.
To get your TextCortex API key:\n1. Sign:
To get your TextCortex API key:
1. Sign up for free at https://textcortex.com
2. Go to your account settings
3. Navigate to the API Key section
4. Generate and copy your API key

Your API key should start with 'gAAAAAB...'
